attributes.action: get Mark Lawrenson off the telly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning for the removal of Mark Lawrenson, the well known BBC football pundit, from the telly on the basis that he is blatantly guilty of lazy journalism, bias both for and against certain Premiership clubs, a disturbing penchant for undoing the top three buttons of his shirt and a general smugness that is unjustified by the garbage he parades as expert analysis.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
